name: Funeral (itch)
description:
An interactive fiction game where you play as a ghost at your own funeral. Watching the people you left behind as they grieve.

Click to interact, you can also move the GhOst with WASD and directional buttons, though I didn't get time to make that feature perform much for you in the game.

I made this in Unity but also with a plug in called Fungus, it handled all the dialogue popping up and the sequences of events. It's definitely worth a play around with cause it's simple to use.

Made as part of my game a week project. Obviously this is kinda buggy and rough but particularly... welll you'll see what I mean when you play. I still like it, wish I had more time to just add 'content' thought. So I probably will return to this at a later date.
